title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4022.9 - Access to all facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4022.9 - Access to all facilities

State Regulations

The stewards have control over, and they and the
stewards of The Jockey Club and members of the commission and their duly
appointed representatives have access to all stands, weighing rooms, enclosures
and all other places within the grounds of the association. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4022.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
